backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining video job types, user profiles, access control checks, and CRUD-like APIs for creating and completing jobs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old video job records by renaming title to prompt and rebuilding the videoJobs map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to features involving real job creation and backend-driven job polling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React app with metadata and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with UI states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting users to enter and save their profile name through a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that blocks access for unauthenticated users and redirects them to sign in.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/JobDet: Modal showing full job details with preview, metadata, and actions to download or share the generated video.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/JobHis: Displays the user's video job history with status badges, preview, download, and share actions, plus a modal for job details.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Renders a grid of public videos with thumbnails and metadata, allowing users to select a video for preview.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryP: Modal for viewing a public video with preview playback and options to download or share.
frontend/src/components/generate/Generat: Form for configuring and submitting video generation requests, including prompt, style, character options, audio, and settings.
Tracks and displays the progress of an active video generation job with simulated progress, preview, and download/share options.
frontend/src/components/generate/presets: Defines preset arrays for durations, video qualities, anime styles, character presets, music styles, and voice languages.
frontend/src/components/generate/storybo: Generates a storyboard by dividing video duration into scenes and auto‑creating scene descriptions and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/generate/Storybo: Shows an auto‑generated storyboard of scenes and lets users confirm creation of a new video job.
frontend/src/components/generate/types.t: Defines TypeScript interfaces for video generation config and storyboard scene structure.
Provides the main page layout with top navigation, footer, and content slot.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a simple branded footer with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements the responsive top navigation bar with auth handling, links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: Displays a grid of feature highlight cards showcasing platform capabilities.
frontend/src/components/pricing/PlanCard: Renders pricing tier cards with features, pricing, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/pricing/PlanComp: Shows a comparison table of plan features across Free, Creator, and Studio tiers.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoPrevi: Simple video player component for previewing videos via a provided URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on user identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Updates document title and meta description based on provided SEO options.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoJobs.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating video job data, including job lists, details, and job creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, themes, gradients, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Authentication page showing login UI and prompting profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying a welcome message and the user's video job history.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Gallery view showing public videos with a modal preview for selected items.
frontend/src/pages/GenerateVideoPage.tsx: Multi-step flow for configuring, previewing, and generating new anime video jobs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing homepage with hero section, feature highlights, and calls to action.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page presenting plan cards and a comparison table for subscription tiers.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility to trigger file downloads via a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Utility to copy a shareable link to the clipboard with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s metadata, feature list, architectural notes, and current app requirements for an AI-based anime video generator.
